channel.title: OMG When people first login they get ....!

item.title: OMG When people first login they get ....!
item.dc:creator: @Y0_J0k3r Y0_J0k3r
item.description:
@Y0_J0k3r wrote:

Search for in player.java…

//Setting Levels

Replace all code with this…

for (int i=0; i<playerLevel.length; i++) { //Setting Levels if (i == 3) { playerLevel[i] = 99; playerXP[i] = 14000000; } else { playerLevel[i] = 1; playerXP[i] = 0; } }

This works on my pimpscape source check it out.
